description:
The Blood FlowMeter Device Enabler is a software addition to LabChart, which supports the Blood FlowMeter hardware, which is manufactured by Oxford Optronix Ltd.

The Blood FlowMeter Device Enabler is a software addition to LabChart, which supports the Blood FlowMeter hardware, which is manufactured by Oxford Optronix Ltd. for distribution by ADInstruments and for use with ADInstruments LabChart software. It allows measurements of blood cell perfusion levels in the microcirculatory beds of skin and other tissues.
